member.name: T:System.Configuration.SettingsProvider
member.summary: SettingsProvider is the configuration class that specifies how a Project setting or a preference should appear in the Settings or Preferences window.

member.name: T:System.Configuration.SettingsProviderAttribute
member.summary: Attribute used to register a new SettingsProvider. Use this attribute to decorate a function that returns an instance of a SettingsProvider. If the function returns null, no SettingsProvider appears in the Settings window.
